item.title: Guardian Pharmacy 在纽交所上市后表现平平，股价上涨 3
item.description: Guardian Pharmacy 的股价在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时上涨了 3.3%，使这家医疗保健公司的市场估值达到约 8.8 亿美元。【原文：Guardian Pharmacy's shares rise 3.3% in their NYSE debut, giving the healthcare firm a market valuation of about $880 million.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，富国银行向美联储提交取消资产上限的重要审查报告
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，富国银行已向美联储提交了一份关于其风险和控制检修的第三方审查报告，因为该公司希望摆脱监管机构规定的资产上限。【原文：Wells Fargo has sent the Federal Reserve a third-party review of its risk and control overhauls as it looks to shed an asset cap imposed by the regulator, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空客交付缓慢引发对年度目标的新质疑
item.description: 分析师和业内人士表示，空中客车公司 9 月份的交付速度低于去年同期，这使人们对其能否实现修订后的年度目标产生了更多疑问。【原文：Airbus deliveries are closing September at a slower pace than a year ago, raising increased questions over its ability to hit a revised annual target, analysts and industry sources said.】

item.title: 瑞银调查显示，多数投资者考虑在美国大选前改变投资组合
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）周四公布的一项调查显示，在11月5日美国总统大选之前，大多数富有的投资者正在考虑改变他们的投资组合。调查发现，随着投资者关注候选人的经济政策，77%的投资者正在考虑新的投资配置。【原文：Most wealthy investors are considering changes in their portfolios ahead of the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election, according to a survey by UBS released on Thursday. As investors focus on the economic policies of the candidates, 77% of them are considering new allocations, the survey found.】

item.title: 美国海运联盟向 NLRB 提出不公平劳动行为指控
item.description: 美国海运联盟周四表示，由于国际码头工人协会（ILA）一再拒绝坐到谈判桌前，该联盟已向全国劳资关系委员会提出不公平劳动行为指控。【原文：The United States Maritime Alliance said on Thursday it had filed an unfair labor practice charge with the National Labor Relations Board, due to the repeated refusal of International Longshoremen's Association (ILA) to come to the bargaining table.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称贴现窗口仅用于紧急情况
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周四表示，银行使用美联储贴现窗口是为了应对紧急情况，而不是为了满足更常见的流动性需求。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Thursday said banks' use of the Fed's discount window is for emergencies, rather than for more usual liquidity needs, a narrow view of the facility that appears to contrast with a recent push by banking regulators to get banks to use it more readily.】

item.title: NAR 称美国 8 月待售住宅销量徘徊在历史最低点附近
item.description: 由于预计美联储将下调基准利率，抵押贷款利率将有所下降，这适度提高了人们的负担能力，因此 8 月份美国旧房购买合同从 7 月份的历史最低水平略有上升。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes edged up in August from July's record-low level as a drop in mortgage interest rates in anticipation of Federal Reserve benchmark rate cuts provided a modest lift to affordability.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯宣布研究参考利率的新努力
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周四表示，该行正在启动一个新的小组，以跟踪参考利率在私人市场中的使用情况。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Thursday his bank is launching a new panel to track how reference rates are used in private markets.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份核心资本货物订单增加
item.description: 尽管第三季度企业设备支出似乎失去了增长势头，但 8 月份美国主要制造业资本货物的新订单却意外增长。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods unexpectedly rose in August, though business spending on equipment appears to have lost momentum in the third quarter.】

item.title: 威士卡同意收购专注于人工智能的企业技术公司Featurespace
item.description: 威士卡公司（Visa）周四表示，已同意收购专注于人工智能的Featurespace公司，该公司致力于开发防止欺诈和金融犯罪的企业技术，具体收购金额未透露。【原文：Visa has agreed to buy AI-focused Featurespace, which develops enterprise technology preventing fraud and financial crime, for an undisclosed amount, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+将在 12 月增加石油产量
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的两位消息人士周四称，欧佩克+组织将继续在12月份增加石油产量，因为如果一些成员国在9月份及以后几个月中实施更大规模的减产计划以弥补产量过剩，那么增产的影响将很小。【原文：OPEC+ is set to go ahead with a December oil output increase as its impact will be small should a plan for some members to make larger cuts to compensate for overproduction be delivered in September and later months, two OPEC+ sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，页岩气生产商 Validus 将收购 Citizen Energy，交易价值超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私营油气生产商 Validus Energy 已达成一项协议，将以超过 20 亿美元的价格（包括债务）收购竞争对手 Citizen Energy。【原文：Privately held oil and gas producer Validus Energy has struck a deal to buy rival Citizen Energy for more than $2 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报告显示，由于销售日减少，美国 9 月汽车销量将下降
item.description: 行业咨询公司J.D. Power和GlobalData周四发布的报告显示，美国9月份新车销量预计同比下降1.8%，部分原因是销售日减少了3天。【原文：New vehicle sales in September in the United States are projected to fall 1.8% from a year ago, partly hurt by three fewer selling days, a report by industry consultants J.D. Power and GlobalData showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济增长未作修正；GDI 大幅上调
item.description: 美国政府周四证实，由于消费支出强劲，美国第二季度经济增长加速。【原文：U.S. economic growth accelerated in the second quarter amid strength in consumer spending, the government confirmed on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗与阿波罗合作进行 250 亿美元的私人信贷交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一份声明报道，花旗集团和私募股权巨头阿波罗全球公司（Apollo Global）已达成一项私募信贷合作协议，将在未来五年内共同完成 250 亿美元的交易。【原文：Citigroup and private equity giant Apollo Global have struck a private credit partnership to work together on $25 billion of deals over the next five years, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a statement.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官称，公司人员离职与重组无关
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周四表示，公司高管最近的离职与公司的重组计划无关。【原文：ChatGPT-maker OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said on Thursday the recent departure of top executives from the company had nothing to do with its planned restructuring.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数意外下降，表明裁员人数仍然较少，这可能会缓解人们对劳动力市场健康状况的担忧。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, pointing to a still low level of layoffs that could ease fears over the labor market's health.】

item.title: 2023 年美国经济增长和企业利润上调
item.description: 美国政府周四公布的修正数据显示，尽管美联储大幅加息，但由于企业投资和消费者支出升级，2023 年美国经济增长速度超过了最初的预期。【原文：The U.S. economy grew faster than initially thought in 2023 amid upgrades to business investment and consumer spending despite hefty interest rate increases from the Federal Reserve, revised government data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 人工智能需求推动收入预期，美光助推芯片股上涨
item.description: 美光科技（Micron Technology）周四在盘前交易中大涨 15%，领涨芯片类股，因其强劲的营收预期预示着对用于支持人工智能生成技术的半导体的强劲需求。【原文：Micron Technology surged 15% on Thursday in premarket trading, leading a rally in chip stocks after its strong revenue forecast signaled robust demand for semiconductors used to power generative AI technology.】

item.title: 每辆车平均价格下跌，CarMax 季度利润不及预期
item.description: 周四，二手车零售商 CarMax 的第二季度利润未能达到华尔街预期，原因是二手车降价促进了单位销售量，但利润率持续低迷。【原文：Used car retailer CarMax missed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday as price cuts on used vehicles boosted unit sales but kept margins depressed.】

item.title: 艾伯维的帕金森病药物在后期试验中达到主要目标
item.description: 艾伯维公司周四表示，在一项晚期试验中，其药物在早期帕金森病患者身上的测试达到了主要目标。【原文：AbbVie said on Thursday its drug met the main goal in a late-stage trial when tested in patients with early Parkinson's disease.】

item.title: 美国西南航空公司概述解决盈利问题的战略
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周四公布了一系列措施，包括与国际航空公司合作、度假套餐和飞机售后回租交易，以扭转其业务并提高利润率。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Thursday unveiled a slew of measures including partnerships with international carriers, vacation packages, and sale-and-leaseback transactions of aircraft to turn around its business and boost profit margins.】

item.title: 巴西银行发起遏制农业企业破产运动
item.description: 巴西国营贷款机构巴西银行（Banco do Brasil）的一位高级管理人员周三表示，该银行是巴西资产规模第二大的银行，它在 6 月份发起了一场运动，以应对农业综合企业部门破产申请的增加。【原文：Brazilian state-run lender Banco do Brasil , the country's second-largest by assets, launched a campaign in June to combat a rise in bankruptcy filings in the agribusiness sector, said a senior executive on Wednesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞公司首席执行官表示，以非营利价格向低收入国家销售药品的计划进展缓慢
item.description: 辉瑞公司计划以非盈利的价格向世界上最贫穷的国家提供药品，该计划启动仅两年多，到目前为止签约的国家还不到计划目标国家的四分之一。【原文：Pfizer has so far signed up less than a quarter of the countries targeted under a plan to make its medicines available to the world’s poorest nations at not-for-profit prices, just over two years after it launched.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛称刺激政策助力中国对冲基金业绩增长
item.description: 高盛黄金经纪公司（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，在中国央行推出自 2020 年中国禽流感疫情以来最大规模的刺激政策后，对冲基金本周交易中国股票的收益有所增加。【原文：Hedge funds trading China stocks saw gains this week after China's central bank unveiled its biggest stimulus since the 2020 COVID pandemic, a note from Goldman Sachs prime brokerage showed.】

item.title: 贸发会议负责人呼吁建立永久性主权债务重组制度
item.description: 联合国贸易和发展会议（United Nations Trade and Development agency）负责人告诉路透社记者，全球金融架构需要一个永久性的主权债务重组机制，因为目前的措施对债权人和借款人来说都是不够的。【原文：The global financial architecture needs a permanent mechanism for restructuring sovereign debt, as measures currently in place have fallen short for creditors and borrowers alike, the head of the U.N. Trade and Development agency told Reuters.】

item.title: 西南航空公司上调第三季度收入预期
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周四上调了第三季度每可用座位里程收入（RASM）的预期。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Thursday raised its third-quarter forecast for revenue per available seat miles (RASM), a proxy for pricing power.】

item.title: 壳牌、埃奎诺（Equinor）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）启用挪威二氧化碳封存设施
item.description: 壳牌（Shell）、埃奎诺（Equinor）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周四表示，它们在挪威西海岸的二氧化碳（CO2）封存项目现已完工，可以接收二氧化碳，预计明年将首次交付。【原文：Shell , Equinor and TotalEnergies said on Thursday their carbon dioxide (CO2) storage project on Norway's west coast is now completed and ready to receive CO2, with its first deliveries expected next year.】

item.title: 埃森哲预测全年收入低于预期
item.description: 埃森哲公司周四预测的年收入低于华尔街的预期，因为企业支出的持续减少继续给专业服务行业带来压力。【原文：Accenture forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as ongoing reductions in enterprise spending continue to weigh on the professional services sector.】

item.title: 耶伦呼吁开展更多金融稳定工作，实施周密监管
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将呼吁继续努力确保金融体系的弹性，包括实施周到的监管，并回击那些希望降低银行资本要求的人。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will call for continued work to ensure a resilient financial system, including pursuing thoughtful regulation and pushing back against those who want to roll back bank capital requirements.】
